name: Plushie Panic! (fakehiking, Austin Blackwell, CentipedeSully, Boggie, druidmancy, Dutt1ez)
name_original: Plushie Panic! (fakehiking, Austin Blackwell, CentipedeSully, Boggie, druidmancy, Dutt1ez)
description:
The game is back up! Thanks for your patience.

Disclaimer: Some of our audio was bugged after exporting to WebGL, which caused music to be missing from the game. For a full experience, check out the de-bugged version here.

Follow Olive—a socially anxious kid at their first sleepover—as they try to rescue their favorite stuffed animal, Bubbles! Will Olive be able to overcome their fears of all that goes bump in the night and reunite with Bubbles?

Plushie Panic! is a single-player RPG created by Sleepover Studios. Thwap your way through rooms full of plushies, face down the monsters of the dark, and even make a spooky friend in this stuffing-filled adventure through a young child’s dreams and fears. 

Created in two weeks for the Buddy Up Jam: Winter 2023.

This is the majority of our team's first game jam!

Note: In the first room you will have to interact with all 4 kids and a couple of objects in the room before you can move to the next room! Room entrances & exits are slightly below the visual for the hallway.

Controls

WASD - Move

F - Interact

Spacebar - Attack/Progress Dialogue
